channel.title: Computer Running Slow Come Here!
channel.description:
[u][b][size=13pt]Is Your Computer Running Slow???[/size][/b][/u] If yes then keep on reading :) :) :)
Step 1: First of all you will need a good file that can find keylogger/trojans/etc download this Ps: its FREE!! Ad-Aware Se [url=http://www.lavasoft.de/products/ad-aware_se_personal.php]http://www.lavasoft.de/products/ad-aware_se_personal.php[/url] Spybot - Search & Destroy [url=http://www.safer-networking.org/en/download/index.html]http://www.safer-networking.org/en/download/index.html[/url]
Step 2: Once you downloaded [b][u]RESTART YOUR COMPUTER!!![/u][/b]
Step 3: Once your computer has fully restarted then Scan for viruses and [b]delete not quarintine![/b]
Step 4: Once you are done with your Virus Scan then go to start>all programs>Accessories>System Tools> Disk Clean up then you clean up all of your files by using disk clean up.
Step 5: After you disk defraged then do this start>all programs>Accessories>System Tools>Disk Defrag click analyze then when you get done analyzing then click defrag and let it defrag [b]Ps: Can take awhile!![/b] but let it go on dont stop!
Step 6: When its Done Defraging Restart Computer again!

item.title: Computer Running Slow Come Here!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Schizzo:

What exactly does that do?

That wipes out your entire drive. Not a cool thing to do.

Oh and Zammyking, there is a lot you can add to this tutorial. Next time before posting, make sure to look through the “All Tutorial Links” sticky to see if someone has already posted your information.

Read full topic

item.title: Computer Running Slow Come Here!
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

[size=13pt]Is Your Computer Running Slow???[/size]
If yes then keep on reading

Step 1: First of all you will need a good file that can find keylogger/trojans/etc download this Ps: its FREE!!
Ad-Aware Se http://www.lavasoft.de/products/ad-aware_se_personal.php
Spybot - Search & Destroy http://www.safer-networking.org/en/download/index.html

Step 2: Once you downloaded RESTART YOUR COMPUTER!!!

Step 3: Once your computer has fully restarted then Scan for viruses and delete not quarintine!

Step 4: Once you are done with your Virus Scan then go to start>all programs>Accessories>System Tools> Disk Clean up then you clean up all of your files by using disk clean up.

Step 5: After you disk defraged then do this start>all programs>Accessories>System Tools>Disk Defrag click analyze then when you get done analyzing then click defrag and let it defrag Ps: Can take awhile!! but let it go on dont stop!

Step 6: When its Done Defraging Restart Computer again!
